p1.title: The Starry Night
p1.description: A famous painting depicting a swirling night sky over a village.

p2.title: Water Lilies
p2.description: An impressionist masterpiece featuring serene water lilies in a pond.

p3.title: The Persistence of Memory
p3.description: A surrealist painting with melting clocks in a dreamlike landscape.

p4.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
p4.description: A captivating portrait known as the Dutch Mona Lisa.

b1.title: The Birth of Venus
b1.description: A Renaissance masterpiece depicting the goddess Venus.

b2.title: The Scream
b2.description: An expressionist work capturing intense emotional anguish.

b3.title: Guernica
b3.description: A powerful anti-war painting depicting the horrors of conflict.

b4.title: The Great Wave
b4.description: A famous Japanese woodblock print of a massive wave.

r1.title: The Last Supper
r1.description: A monumental fresco depicting Jesus and the apostles during the final meal; renowned for perspective and dramatic emotion.

r2.title: The Creation of Adam
r2.description: A fresco on the Sistine Chapel ceiling showing God giving life to Adam; one of the most iconic images ever created.

r3.title: The School of Athens
r3.description: A fresco celebrating philosophy, featuring Plato, Aristotle, and other great thinkers; a masterpiece of symmetry and perspective.

l1.title: The Birth of Venus
l1.description: A mythological painting portraying Venus emerging from the sea; celebrated for elegance, grace, and symbolism.

l2.title: Primavera
l2.description: A visually rich allegorical painting representing spring and mythological figures like Venus, Cupid, and the Three Graces.

l3.title: Annunciation
l3.description: An early work showing the angel Gabriel visiting Mary; known for Leonardo's delicate handling of light and atmospheric perspective.

p1-front.title: Mona Lisa
p1-front.description: The most famous portrait in the world, known for its mysterious smile and masterful use of sfumato.

p2-front.title: Assumption of the Virgin
p2-front.description: A dramatic altar painting showing the Virgin Mary rising to heaven, admired for its vibrant color and dynamic composition.

p3-front.title: Sistine Madonna
p3-front.description: Revered for its serene holy figures and the two famous cherubs at the bottom of the painting.

p4-front.title: The Holy Trinity
p4-front.description: Known as the first masterpiece using linear perspective; it revolutionized Renaissance painting techniques.

p5-front.title: The Arnolfini Portrait
p5-front.description: A hyper-detailed oil painting famous for its symbolism and the incredible realism of textures and light.

l4.title: The Garden of Earthly Delights
l4.description: A triptych depicting paradise, earth, and hell.

l5.title: The Kiss
l5.description: A symbolist painting of an embracing couple.

float1.title: Impression, Sunrise
float1.description: The painting that gave Impressionism its name.

float2.title: Nighthawks
float2.description: An iconic American scene of a late-night diner.

float3.title: The Hay Wain
float3.description: A romantic landscape of the English countryside.

float4.title: Wanderer above the Sea of Fog
float4.description: A romantic painting of a figure contemplating nature.

c1.title: The Starry Night
c1.description: A swirling night sky over a quiet village, painted with emotional intensity; one of the most celebrated modern artworks.

c2.title: Composition with Red, Blue, and Yellow
c2.description: A key abstract painting from the De Stijl movement, using geometric shapes and primary colors to express harmony and balance.

c3.title: The Scream
c3.description: An iconic expressionist painting capturing existential anxiety and emotional turmoil with intense colors and swirling lines.

right-l1.title: The Wanderer Above the Ruins
right-l1.description: A dystopian reinterpretation of the romantic "Wanderer Above the Sea of Fog," featuring futuristic destroyed cities.

right-l2.title: Bloom
right-l2.description: A vibrant, stylized depiction of a girl surrounded by flowers, representing growth and renewal.

right-l3.title: The Stranger
right-l3.description: A portrait of a mysterious woman with intricate costume designs and expressive lighting.

right-l4.title: The White Dragon
right-l4.description: A serene fantasy portrait of a maiden and a dragon, known for its painterly softness and ethereal lighting.

right-r1.title: The Shire – Hobbiton (Concept Art)
right-r1.description: Digital concept art for *The Lord of the Rings* showing Hobbiton's iconic landscape.

right-r2.title: The Mines of Moria (Concept Art)
right-r2.description: A dramatic digital painting visualizing the vast underground architecture of Moria.

right-r3.title: Coruscant Cityscape (Concept Art)
right-r3.description: A digital/paint hybrid imagining of Coruscant for the Star Wars prequels; very famous and widely referenced.

right-r4.title: Dreamscape No. 42
right-r4.description: Psychedelic digital art featuring fractal dreams, spiritual motifs, and vibrant neon colors.

right-c1.title: Star Wars: Duel on Mustafar (Concept Art)
right-c1.description: Concept art for *Revenge of the Sith*, showing the fiery volcano duel; highly influential in digital environment design.

right-c2.title: Union
right-c2.description: A symbolic merging of two figures into a cosmic energy form; themes of consciousness and transcendence.
